lexUnit.name: forecast.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: predict or estimate (a future event or trend).

sentence.text: She forecast that if nothing were done , violence would erupt .
Market research company Inteco forecasts that the European multimedia market could be worth as much as £10bn by 1994 .
Hayes forecasts that up until the year 2000 the library proportion will remain stable at 4% , but growth will occur in the IT proportion , rising to 11% of the institutional budget .
Doctors forecast that only half the people who stopped smoking will still be off cigarettes in a year .
